text: Bajheri is a medium village located in Muzaffarnagar district, Uttar Pradesh, India. It is 3 km away from Muzaffarnagar City. This village was founded around 300 years ago by Mr Bundu who also owned a bagh (garden) about 1000 bighas, which is about one-third the area of the whole village. This village consists 97% of Muslims and 3% of Dalit (chamar). It is a Muslim Gaur majority village. Urdu education's "madarsa" (Jamiyatul Abrar) where Islamic study is taught. Category:Villages in Muzaffarnagar district
title: Bajheri
